text: The women's 400 metres event at the 2007 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Debrecen, Hungary, at Gyulai István Atlétikai Stadion on 12 and 13 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Lyudmila Litvinova ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Olga Shulikova ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Kseniya Zadorina ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 13 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
